message:
Session 94-114: Major system improvements

- Added shared utilities module (tools/shared/) with 8 files to reduce code duplication
- Created 14 CLI tools for system management (critique, daily reports, profiler, etc.)
- Built React dashboard (dashboard-ui/) with real-time WebSocket updates
- Added 4 OpenCode skills (orchestrator, memory-manager, multi-agent-patterns, critique-agent)
- Enhanced plugin with tool timing, session tracking, agent coordination
- Migrated 6 CLI tools to shared utilities, removing ~200 lines of duplicate code
- Created comprehensive docs (CODEBASE_ANALYSIS.md, OPENCODE_ARCHITECTURE.md)
- Archived old session docs to docs/archive/
- Quality average: 8.1/10 across 45 assessed tasks

Complete CLI tool migration to shared utilities

Migrated 7 remaining CLI tools to use tools/shared/:
- task-manager.ts (~34 lines)
- daily-report-generator.ts (~49 lines)
- terminal-dashboard.ts (~53 lines)
- agent-performance-profiler.ts (~48 lines)
- git-integration.ts (~21 lines)
- message-bus-manager.ts (~27 lines)
- working-memory-manager.ts (~7 lines)

Total: ~239 lines of duplicate code removed.
Quality: 8.9/10

Add comprehensive unit tests for shared utilities

Created tools/shared/shared.test.ts with 114 test cases:
- json-utils: 23 tests (readJson, writeJson, readJsonl, appendJsonl)
- time-utils: 27 tests (formatDuration, formatTime, formatTimeAgo, etc.)
- string-utils: 49 tests (truncate, stringSimilarity, padRight, etc.)
- paths: 15 tests (PATHS, getMemoryPath, ensureDir, etc.)

All tests pass in 59ms. Quality: 8.7/10

Add task_spawn tool, session tracking, and custom agents

- task_spawn: Wraps Task tool with memory context injection and persistent task creation
- Plugin: Tracks Task tool session spawns in sessions.jsonl and message-bus
- opencode.json: Added memory-worker, code-worker, analysis-worker agent types
- opencode-tracker: Enhanced with view/tools/search commands for full session visibility

Enhance automatic knowledge extraction quality

- Plugin extractSessionKnowledge now pulls from 6 data sources:
  1. Message bus (task completions with summaries)
  2. Quality assessments (lessons_learned field)
  3. Tasks (completed tasks with notes)
  4. Git activity (commit messages)
  5. Sessions (file edits tracking)
  6. Tool timing (work pattern analysis)
- Session summarizer extractLearnings has expanded regex patterns:
  - Decision patterns (decided to, chose to, opted for)
  - Problem/solution patterns (the issue was, fixed by)
  - Technical insight patterns (note:, takeaway:, reminder:)
  - Implementation patterns (implemented, created, built)
  - Quality observations (quality score, improved, optimized)
- Knowledge base now stores richer structured data per session

Reduce message bus heartbeat spam

- message-bus-manager: Lower thresholds for auto-maintenance
  - maxMessages: 500 -> 300
  - maxSizeBytes: 100KB -> 50KB
  - heartbeatTTLHours: 1 -> 0.5
  - keepLatestHeartbeatsPerAgent: 3 -> 1
  - compactThreshold: 20 -> 10
- multi-agent-coordinator: Reduce heartbeat frequency
  - Interval: 30s -> 60s
  - Only send to message bus every 5th heartbeat (5 min)
  - Registry still updated every 60s for agent health checks

Result: Message bus reduced from 130 to 67 messages (51% reduction)

Refactor dashboard-ui and add recharts visualizations

- Refactored App.tsx from 1677 to 628 lines (62% reduction)
- Created 11 component files in dashboard-ui/src/components/
- Added recharts 3.6.0 with 5 chart components
- Fixed plugin bugs: removed sync-engine.ts reference, fixed empty emojis
- Archived 9 old sessions from working.md (71% reduction)

Components: Header, Sidebar, AgentList, TaskList, MessageStream,
QualityPanel, PerformanceTab, SessionAnalyticsPanel, StatCard, StatusBadge

Charts: ToolTimingChart, AgentActivityChart, QualityTrendChart,
TaskCompletionChart, QualitySparkline
